title: 1 BED NEWLY RENOVATED
posting_body: We are just finishing up the renovation of this 1 bedroom 1 bath down unit apartment.
The beautiful spacious porch is a great place to sit and relax on lazy hot summer days while you enjoy a cool drink.
This unit haS, fresh new paint, updated fixtures.
The kitchen it has new updates and so much more.
The beautiful bright living room is spacious and a great place to enjoy family and friends.
This home has an eat in kitchen perfect for easy clean up for those days when you are on the go.
The wonderful spacious backyard is the place to be this summer hanging out friends and family while enjoying the warmer weather.
There is a shared 2 car garage and basement with extra storage space.
With all the updates and extra room in this unit you won't want to miss it.
Schedule your showing now before it's gone.
